PAGERBEAUTY_PD_API_KEY.description: PagerDuty REST API v2 Access Key (Read-only). Generate your key https://support.pagerduty.com/docs/using-the-api or try test key y_NbAkKc66ryYTWUXYEu

PAGERBEAUTY_PD_SCHEDULES.description: Comma-separated list of PagerDuty schedule ids. You can find schedule id in the URL of the schedule on PagerDuty website after symbol #. Or try test schedules: PJ1P5JQ,P538IZH

PAGERBEAUTY_HTTP_USER.description: (optional) Enable basic HTTP authentication: user name

PAGERBEAUTY_HTTP_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: (optional) Enable access_token authentication. Makes possible embedding PagerBeauty in browsers that don't support iframes with basic HTTP authentication enabled. Append ?access_token=your_token to schedule URL to make it embeddable
